terms.term1: I understand that my funds are held securely on this device, not by a company.
terms.term2: I understand that if this app is moved to another device or deleted, my funds can only be recovered with the recovery phrase.
terms.term3: I have read, understood, and agreed to the Terms of Use.

unableRecover.title: Unable to recover
unableRecover.body: We are unable to import a wallet with your recovery phrase. Please make sure the phrase is correct.

duplicatePhrase.title: Duplicate Phrase
duplicatePhrase.body: This phrase is already imported in the app. Please try with a different phrase.

tooManyPhrase.title: Too Many Words
tooManyPhrase.body: The recovery phrase has to be 12 words.

txFailed.title: Transfer is failed
txFailed.moreBTC: You need more BTC balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreRBTC: You need more RBTC balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreRIF: You need more RIF balance to complete the transfer
txFailed.moreBalance: You need more balance to complete the transfer

guardPhrase.title: Safeguard your recovery phrase
guardPhrase.body: Your recovery phrase is composed of 12 randomly selected words. Please carefully write down each word in the order they appear.

incorrectBackupPhrase.title: Incorrect backup phrase
incorrectBackupPhrase.body: It's important that you write your recovery phrase down correctly. If something happens to your wallet, you'll need it to recover your money. Please review and try again.

phraseCopied.title: Copied
phraseCopied.body: The recovery phrase has been copied to the clipboard.

addressCopied.title: Copied
addressCopied.body: The address has been copied to the clipboard.

passcode.oldIncorrect: Old Passcode is incorrect, try again
passcode.notMatched: Passcode does not match. Please try again.

touchSensor.title: Touch Sensor
touchSensor.nativeNote: Scan your fingerprint on the device scanner to continue
touchSensor.fingerprintNotMatch: Fingerprint does not match. Please try again.

createPasscode.title: Please set a password
createPasscode.body: Password can protect your funds if this device is stolen or compromised by malicious software.

deleteKey.title: Warning!
deleteKey.body: Are you sure you want to delete all wallets using this key?

swap.title: No swappable coin
swap.body: Swap supports BTC, RBTC and DOC. Please add asset.

contractNotFound.title: ERC20 Contract Not Found
contractNotFound.body: We cannot find the input ERC20 token smart contract. Please check if it is right.

duplicateToken.title: Duplicate Token
duplicateToken.body: This token is already added in the wallet. Please try with a different token.
